EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of Application Submission
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Student_Programme__c.Student__c}
Thank you for submitting your application for the {!Student_Programme__c.Programme__c},{!Student_Programme__c.Programme_Type__c}, and for your interest in studying at the Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine.
If we require further documentation in order to process your application then we will contact you within the next 5 working days to request this.
Once your application has been submitted for processing, you can normally expect a decision within 15 working days for taught programmes and short courses and 20 working days for research programmes.
If you have any queries about your application, please e-mail MyLSTM@lstmed.ac.uk
Yours sincerely
The Admissions Team The Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine Pembroke Place Liverpool L3 5QA
